commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas1301431"

diff:
"1301431 Bug 392708 - "Can't build with Orcas B2 (Sqlite error)" [p=aliumalik@gmail.com (Ali Malik) r+a1.9=bsmedberg]
diff --git a/db/sqlite3/src/Makefile.in b/db/sqlite3/src/Makefile.in
index a5aab39..c19891d 100644
--- a/db/sqlite3/src/Makefile.in
+++ b/db/sqlite3/src/Makefile.in
@@ -51,7 +51,6 @@ VISIBILITY_FLAGS =
 
 ifeq (,$(filter-out WINNT WINCE,$(OS_ARCH)))
 ifndef GNU_CC
-MAPFILE = $(LIBRARY_NAME).map
 DEFFILE = $(win_srcdir)/sqlite.def
 endif
 endif
"
